channel.title: [317] EcosiaX | Economy | Duo-Slayer | Flawless Pking | Tons of Minigames |
channel.description:
[CENTER][CENTER][CENTER][CENTER][IMG]http://puu.sh/9IGmG/7eb6d597dc.jpg[/img][/CENTER] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IGtM/5a18d10256.jpg[/img]
Website: [url=http://ecosiax.net/index.html]EcosiaX - The number one Runescape Private Server[/url] Webclient: [url=http://ecosiax.net/webclient.php]EcosiaX - The number one Runescape Private Server[/url] Lightweight Desktop Client: [url=http://ecosiax.net/EcosiaX.jar]http://ecosiax.net/EcosiaX.jar[/url] Forums: [url=http://ecosiax.net/forums/]Invision Power Board[/url] Donate: [url=http://ecosiax.net/donate.php]http://ecosiax.net/donate.php[/url] Vote: [url=http://ecosiax.net/vote/#?step=1]EcosiaX - Voting[/url][/CENTER]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/9IJhC/08da090321.jpg[/img]
[COLOR="#00FF00"]-AMAZING website!
-Unique Ticket system for player support!
-Caring staff team
-Duo Slayer! Train slayer with a friend!
-Pest Control! Grab yourself some void!
-Castle wars! Never will you be bored!
-Dicing with it's own teleport location
-Automatic Donations!
-TONS of bosses!
-Vote rewards!
-Amazing donator zone!
-Target system! Kill your target and become the top pker!
-Bank Tabs to organize and keep your bank clean!
-Switchable gameframes!
-Client settings
-Money Pouch! Now you can keep money on you at all times!
-Revenant cave! Don't get killed!
-Killsteam system!
-Player user titles!
-Curses/quick prayers!
-Full summoning with working specials
-ALL skills trainable with their own skilling zone
-Stable economy
-Pking is fun, and worth value
-Trivia Bots
-Perfect boss animations with multiple attack styles
-Great shops to fulfill the needs of players
-Working clue scrolls
-Perfect bridding, welfare, pure, range, mage pking
-Great pvm community
-Unique barrows with interface
-Very unique teleport interface offering many teleports
-63 waves of Jad, log out between waves supported!
[B][I][U]That's not all! EcosiaX has millions more features, these were just some of them![/U][/I][/B][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/9IOxL/14e298a7c5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9ILXI/1de1886c96.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IMee/611189700b.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IMsp/83b393ce1a.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IMj8/6657d9850d.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IMJx/4c27e4c1c4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9INHB/61f44c305d.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IO0i/0e0e20454c.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IOcV/4123adee74.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IOaQ/828db09ae0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IOoT/437fbf7bdd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IOsc/4e8cc886d5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9INmS/31e63f8f2a.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IMcV/b593f29221.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IP6O/a360182dc8.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IPd0/79e1c85405.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IPkI/2a0cffa474.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IPFX/15b2a9f5d5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/9IPoc/7116701a35.jpg[/img] [/CENTER]
[SIZE=6]I HOPE TO SEE YOU ALL THERE!!! [url=http://www.EcosiaX.net]EcosiaX - The number one Runescape Private Server[/url][/SIZE]

item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

Well. Maybe you should advertise something you coded :palm: This is an exact leach of Simplcity V2 lmao. You just changed the name… Everything is in the exact same spot. But I guess welcome to the new generation of RSPS.
OT: Meh.
